# Software download image from imgbb
## _Software pyhton, excel _

[![N|Solid](https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/128/919/919852.png)]()

[![N|Solid](data:image/jpeg;base64,)]()

## versions
- python 3.12.4
-  virtualenv



## Installation and execution
Descargar repositorio en un directorio de trabajo
```sh
git lcone git@github.com:Taoista/download_imgbb.git
```

enter directorie
```sh
cd download_imgbb
```
crear un entorno virtual
```sh
virtualenv env
```
iniciar el entorno virtual
```sh
./env/scripts/activate
```
Edit the 'products' Excel file. The first column contains a unique identifier or a sequential number, the next column contains the image name, and the third column contains the URL for downloading.

| id | codigo | media       |
|---------------|---------------------|--------------------------|
| 1             | imagen1.jpg         | https://example.com/img1 |
| 2             | imagen2.jpg         | https://example.com/img2 |
| 3             | imagen3.jpg         | https://example.com/img3 |
| ...           | ...                 | ...                      |


install package

```sh
pip install -r requirements.txt
```
The software will create a folder called 'final,' where the images will be saved.
